description:
Eri`s become a true master food reviewer! The female Perorimon, Maripero, comes to Eri to learn her secrets! But why does Dokamon have to look after her, then?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokamon in Love?! Dining App Maripero Attacks!
Dokamon no Koi!? Gourmet Appli Maripero Shuurai!
ドカモンの恋!? グルメアプリ・マリペロ襲来!
